Navigation
Name Rascal/Expressions/Values/Number
Synopsis Numeric values.
Syntax Library functions: import Number;
Types int, real, num
Details abs Addition arbInt arbReal Conditional cos Division Equal GreaterThan GreaterThanOrEqual LessThan LessThanOrEqual ln log max min Multiplication Negation NotEqual nroot pow Remainder sin sqrt Subtraction tan toInt toReal toString
Description Numbers include integers (values of type int) and reals (values of type real). If both operands have the same type (int or real) then the operator is the corresponding operator on integers or reals. Otherwise, integer arguments are first converted to real and the real operator is applied.

The following functions are provided for numbers:
  • abs: Absolute value of a numeric value.
  • Addition: Addition on numeric values.
  • arbInt: Generate a random integer value.
  • arbReal: Generate a random real value.
  • Conditional: Conditional expression for numeric values.
  • cos: Calculate the cosine of a numeric value.
  • Division: Division on numeric values.
  • Equal: Equality operator on numeric values.
  • GreaterThan: Greater than operator on numeric values.
  • GreaterThanOrEqual: Greater than or equal operator on numeric values.
  • LessThan: Less than operator on numeric values.
  • LessThanOrEqual: Less than or equal operator on numeric values.
  • ln: Calculate the natural log of a numeric value.
  • log: Calculate the logbase of a numeric value.
  • max: Determine the largest of two numeric values.
  • min: Determine the smallest of two numeric values.
  • Multiplication: Multiply two numeric values.
  • Negation: Negate a numeric value.
  • NotEqual: Not equal operator on numeric values.
  • nroot: Calculate the nth root of a numeric value.
  • pow: Calculate the arbitrary power of a numeric value.
  • Remainder: Remainder of two integer values.
  • sin: Calculate the sine of a numeric value.
  • sqrt: Calculate the square root of a numeric value.
  • Subtraction: Subtract two numeric values.
  • tan: Calculate the tangent of a numeric value.
  • toInt: Convert a numeric value to an integer.
  • toReal: Convert a numeric value to a real.
  • toString: Convert a numeric value to a string.
